attributes.action: Block the Home Office proposal to compel council staff, charity workers and doctors to tip off police about anyone they believe could commit a violent crime.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Block the Home Office proposal to compel council staff, charity workers and doctors to tip off police about anyone they believe could commit a violent crime.  This surely is against civil liberties.  It is open to abuse, and will just instigate witch hunts.  Great Britain will become a police state not unlike the Gestapo in Nazi Germany or the Stasi in East Germany.
